casebody.data:
Ruth KATZ and Hyman S. Katz, Plaintiffs-Appellees, v. ITALA PLOTTE RIUNITE COSULICH LLOYD SABAUDO, NAVIGAZIONE GENERALE, Also Known as Italian Line, Defendant-Appellant. No. 119. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 3, 1938. Loomis, Williams & Donahue, of New York City (Homer L. Loomis, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Irving Kaufman and Single & Tyler, all of New York City (Douglas D. Crystal and Wilbur H. Hecht, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before ' MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges'.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
